J Steven Raquel

Welcome!

Thanks for visiting my personal website. I’m J Steven Raquel, a statistics undergrad at UC Santa Barbara, set to graduate in spring of 2018. Find out more about who I am.

If you know anything about data science, statistics, machine learning, AI, or computer science, get in touch with me! I have a lot to learn so I’m eager to get in touch with folks with similar interests.

Projects

These are some of the projects I’ve worked on throughout my time studying data science.

Machine Learning

  • Classifying wine quality

For my final project for PSTAT 131 Data Mining, I used and compared the decision tree, randomForest and k-Nearest Neighbors algorithms to determine the quality of a wine and what the best algorithm was for classification. I also came to determine what attributes were most important towards a good wine.


Data Visualization

  • Visualizing IMDB ratings

I looked at the past several decades in film as far back as the 1980s, and visualized each one to see what was the best audience-reviewed decade and what the best films were.
